exceptions.tactic: apply is_series_ext with (a := fun k => a (S k)) (b := fun k => a (k + 1)%nat).
exceptions.exn: In environment K : AbsRing V : NormedModule K a : nat -> V l : V H : is_series a (plus l (a 0%nat)) P : V -> Prop l0 : locally ?M2365 P Unable to unify "filtermap (sum_n (fun k : nat => a (k + 1)%nat)) eventually P" with "filtermap (sum_n (fun k : nat => a (S k))) eventually P".
The LHS of Nat.add_1_r (_ + 1)%nat does not match any subterm of the goal

original: intros. apply is_series_ext with (a := fun k => a (S k)) (b := fun k => a (k + 1)%nat). intros. rewrite Nat.add_1_r. reflexivity. auto.
